Text:
I as original author of this image, I support this torrent, as information such as this really wants to be free.

However, if you enjoy this image, then you will love the poster.  The sales of the poster allow me to take the two months required to create the image.

The poster is available for $24 here,

http://www.wallstats.com/deathandtaxes/#purchase

It will also make you look smart, and the ladies will want your sexy pants.  Trust me.

@Jess: Glad to know. And yeah, it is a bit lossy. Whoever scanned it had the full sized I am guessing, but it was posted on /hr/, so it was resized a bit.

Thanks for the work.
